Communication.label: Teams Chat
Communication.prompt: Write teams message from give breif message: ${Breif Message:input}. Use ${tone:[formal, informal, professional]}

Communication.label: Write Formal Email
Communication.prompt: Write a formal email to ${recipient:input} regarding ${subject:input}. Include ${body:textarea}, maintain a ${tone:[formal, professional, neutral]} tone, and add a ${call_to_action:bool} if necessary.

Communication.label: Draft Team Announcement
Communication.prompt: Compose an announcement for ${team:input} about ${event:input}. Provide ${details:textarea} and set the tone to ${tone:[urgent, casual, informative]}.

Communication.label: Request Feedback
Communication.prompt: Request feedback from ${person:input} on ${topic:input}. Use a ${tone:[polite, direct, friendly]} tone and include ${specific_questions:textarea}.

Communication.label: Schedule Meeting
Communication.prompt: Draft a message to ${recipient:input} to schedule a meeting about ${purpose:input} on ${date:input}. Suggest ${time:input} and ask for ${confirmation:bool}.

Communication.label: Thank You Note
Communication.prompt: Write a thank you note to ${person:input} for ${reason:input}. Keep it ${tone:[formal, friendly, brief]} and include a ${personal_touch:bool}.

Writing Assistance.label: Proofread Text
Writing Assistance.prompt: Proofread this text: ${content:textarea}. Correct grammar, spelling, and improve ${aspects:{clarity, flow, conciseness}}.

Writing Assistance.label: Simplify Explanation
Writing Assistance.prompt: Simplify this explanation: ${text:textarea} for a ${audience:[beginner, intermediate, expert]} audience. Avoid ${jargon:bool}.

Writing Assistance.label: Generate Blog Intro
Writing Assistance.prompt: Write an engaging intro for a blog post about ${topic:input}. Target ${audience:[general, tech, students]} and set the tone to ${tone:[exciting, informative, humorous]}.

Writing Assistance.label: Rewrite Sentence
Writing Assistance.prompt: Rewrite this sentence: ${sentence:input} to be ${tone:[formal, casual, concise]} and adjust for ${audience:[professional, casual, youth]}.

Writing Assistance.label: Create Social Media Post
Writing Assistance.prompt: Craft a social media post for ${platform:[Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram]} about ${topic:input}. Include ${hashtags:input} and keep it ${tone:[engaging, professional, fun]}.

Code & Development.label: Explain Code Snippet
Code & Development.prompt: Explain this code: ${code:textarea} to a ${audience:[junior dev, non-technical, senior dev]}. Highlight ${focus:{logic, syntax, purpose}}.

Code & Development.label: Generate Commit Message
Code & Development.prompt: Write a commit message for changes to ${feature:input}. Follow ${style:[conventional commits, simple, detailed]} and mention ${impact:input}.

Code & Development.label: Debug Description
Code & Development.prompt: Describe this bug: ${issue:textarea} for ${recipient:input}. Suggest ${fixes:input} and set urgency to ${level:[low, medium, high]}.

Code & Development.label: Code Review Comment
Code & Development.prompt: Write a code review comment for ${code:textarea}. Make it ${tone:[constructive, direct, encouraging]} and suggest ${improvements:input}.

Code & Development.label: API Request Example
Code & Development.prompt: Create an example API request for ${endpoint:input} with ${method:[GET, POST, PUT, DELETE]}. Include ${parameters:input} and ${body:bool}.

Productivity.label: Task Assignment
Productivity.prompt: Assign a task to ${assignee:input} about ${task:input}. Set deadline to ${date:input}, provide ${details:textarea}, and request ${confirmation:bool}.

Productivity.label: Meeting Agenda
Productivity.prompt: Create a meeting agenda for ${topic:input} with ${team:input}. List ${items:textarea} and assign ${duration:input} per item.

Productivity.label: Daily Standup Update
Productivity.prompt: Write a standup update for ${team:input}. Include ${yesterday:textarea}, ${today:textarea}, and ${blockers:input}.

Productivity.label: Project Summary
Productivity.prompt: Summarize the ${project:input} project for ${audience:[team, stakeholders, manager]}. Cover ${details:textarea} and highlight ${status:[in progress, completed, delayed]}.

Productivity.label: To-Do List Reminder
Productivity.prompt: Draft a reminder for ${person:input} about ${tasks:input}. Set tone to ${tone:[urgent, friendly, neutral]} and include ${due_date:input}.

Creative.label: Story Starter
Creative.prompt: Write a story starter about ${character:input} in ${setting:input}. Use ${genre:[fantasy, mystery, sci-fi]} and add ${twist:input}.

Creative.label: Tagline Generator
Creative.prompt: Create a tagline for ${product:input} targeting ${audience:[youth, professionals, families]}. Make it ${tone:[catchy, serious, playful]}.

Creative.label: Poem Prompt
Creative.prompt: Write a short poem about ${theme:input} with ${style:[haiku, free verse, rhymed]}. Include ${emotions:{joy, sadness, hope}}.

Creative.label: Brainstorm Ideas
Creative.prompt: Brainstorm ${quantity:input} ideas for ${project:input}. Focus on ${aspects:{innovation, feasibility, fun}} and keep it ${tone:[serious, creative, light]}.

Creative.label: Character Bio
Creative.prompt: Create a bio for ${name:input}, a ${role:[hero, villain, sidekick]} in ${setting:input}. Describe ${traits:textarea} and ${motivation:input}.

Education.label: Lesson Plan Outline
Education.prompt: Outline a lesson plan for ${subject:input} aimed at ${level:[beginner, intermediate, advanced]}. Include ${objectives:textarea} and ${activities:input}.

Education.label: Quiz Question
Education.prompt: Write a quiz question about ${topic:input} for ${audience:[students, professionals, general]}. Make it ${type:[multiple choice,         short answer, true/false]} with ${difficulty:[easy, medium, hard]}.

Education.label: Study Guide Summary
Education.prompt: Summarize ${topic:input} for a study guide. Cover ${key_points:textarea} and simplify for ${audience:[high school, college, adult learners]}.

Education.label: Explain Concept
Education.prompt: Explain ${concept:input} to ${audience:[kids, teens, adults]} using ${examples:input}. Keep it ${tone:[simple, engaging, detailed]}.

Education.label: Homework Prompt
Education.prompt: Create a homework assignment for ${subject:input}. Assign ${task:textarea}, set due date to ${date:input}, and require ${submission:bool}.

Support.label: Customer Response
Support.prompt: Respond to a customer complaint about ${issue:input} from ${name:input}. Apologize, offer ${solution:input}, and use a ${tone:[empathetic, professional, friendly]} tone.

Support.label: FAQ Entry
Support.prompt: Write an FAQ entry for ${question:input}. Provide ${answer:textarea} and target ${audience:[users, staff, clients]}.

Support.label: Troubleshooting Guide
Support.prompt: Create a troubleshooting guide for ${problem:input}. List ${steps:textarea} and suggest ${contact:bool} if unresolved.

Support.label: Escalation Email
Support.prompt: Draft an email to escalate ${issue:input} to ${recipient:input}. Describe ${details:textarea}, set urgency to ${level:[low, medium, high]}, and request ${follow_up:bool}.

Support.label: Support Ticket Summary
Support.prompt: Summarize a support ticket for ${customer:input} about ${issue:input}. Include ${resolution:input} and status ${status:[open, resolved, pending]}.
